text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Thread is a lie. Stop gaslighting #WeThePeople. NO way economy will recover without proper testing. You are killing people with your disinformation campaign. Because your cult is obedient, they are more at risk of death by #COVID19. They may not be around to vote in November.
